title: INSIGHT: Historic opera staged at Egypt's Pyramids
text:
INSIGHT: Historic opera staged at Egypt's Pyramids 2:10pm EDT - 00:58 
The Giza Pyramids hosted the epic Opera Aida, a tale of love and betrayal in ancient Egypt.Nearly 2,800 people attended the historic performance held for the first time since 2009 against the backdrop of the Pyramids and the Sphinx.   Giza Pyramids hosted the epic Opera Aida, a tale of love and betrayal in ancient Egypt.Nearly 2,800 people attended the historic performance held for the first time since 2009 against the backdrop of the Pyramids and the Sphinx.  //reut.rs/2p5VLFH
